p: A beneficial role of vitexin is described for DLB and other neurodegenerative diseases. Vitexin, found in several medicinal plants such as hawthorn, pearl millet, and Ficus deltoidea, regulates neuroinflammation and possesses a neuroprotective effect. Vitexin epigenetically regulates the proinflammatory cytokines and can be considered a potential candidate for the treatment of DLB and other neurodegenerative diseases [ 85].
